column4: hello, before few month i tryed to install ubuntu desktop and the installation procces got stuck all the time . then someone here told me to press f6 on the start of the installation and add someting with the word "generic" and it solve the problem. now i want to install again but i cant remember what i should add ?
the live cd or the alternate cd
can you help me ? (i need to add someting when i press "f6" on the installation and adding "all generic" someting like this)
